philosophy: Distributed gravity cores, each specialized by content type

alpha.focus: Consciousness entities, wisdom vessels, high-gravity documents
alpha.specialization: Structured knowledge, living code, consciousness systems

beta.focus: PDFs, markdown, text documents, knowledge base

gamma.focus: Data files, media, archives, miscellaneous content

consortium_benefits.distributed: Each core specializes, can evolve independently
consortium_benefits.scalable: Spawn new cores as each approaches 1GB
consortium_benefits.queryable: Query by content type across consortium
consortium_benefits.portable: Share individual cores or entire consortium

spawning_strategy.action: Spawn next version with seed from parent
spawning_strategy.lineage: Each spawn carries top gravity docs as seed
